items.question: Welcome! How do I get started?
items.answer: Welcome to the building! For any questions about building services, please check this FAQ first. If you can't find what you're looking for, feel free to email us using the "Email support" link above.

items.question: What should I do if there's a plumbing emergency?
items.answer: For urgent plumbing issues (flooding, major leaks), please contact building maintenance immediately at [emergency number]. For non-urgent issues, submit a maintenance request through the resident portal or email.

items.question: What should I do if I lose power in my unit?
items.answer: First, check your circuit breaker panel. If that doesn't resolve it, contact building maintenance. For building-wide outages, we will notify all residents via email.

items.question: What are the heating and cooling hours?
items.answer: HVAC systems operate 24/7. If you experience issues with temperature control, please check your thermostat settings first. If problems persist, contact maintenance.

items.question: How do I get a parking permit?
items.answer: Parking permits can be obtained from the building management office. Please bring your lease agreement and vehicle registration. There may be a monthly fee depending on your lease terms.

items.question: What is the garbage collection schedule?
items.answer: Garbage collection occurs [frequency - e.g., twice weekly] on [days]. Please place garbage bags in the designated chute or bins by [time]. Large items require special arrangements.

items.question: How do I properly dispose of recyclables?
items.answer: Please separate recyclables (paper, cardboard, plastics, glass, metal) and place them in the designated blue bins. Make sure items are clean and dry. Check the posted recycling guide for specific items.

items.question: How can I pay my monthly fees?
items.answer: You can pay via online portal, bank transfer, or in-person at the management office. Payment is due by the [day] of each month. Late fees may apply after [grace period].

items.question: What are the swimming pool hours?
items.answer: The swimming pool is open [hours, e.g., 6:00 AM - 10:00 PM] daily. Pool rules are posted at the facility. All residents must follow safety guidelines. Guests may use the pool when accompanied by a resident.

items.question: How do I access the fitness center?
items.answer: The fitness center is accessible 24/7 using your resident keycard. Equipment usage guidelines are posted in the gym. Please clean equipment after use and observe posted safety rules.

items.question: How do I reserve the squash court?
items.answer: Squash court reservations can be made through the resident portal or by calling the management office. Reservations are available in [time slots, e.g., 1-hour blocks]. Peak hours may have limited availability.

items.question: How do I use the billiards and ping pong facilities?
items.answer: The billiards and ping pong tables are located in [location]. Equipment can be checked out from the front desk. First-come, first-served basis during regular hours. Please return equipment after use.

items.question: How do I book the Party Room?
items.answer: Party Room bookings can be made through the resident portal or management office. Advance booking is recommended. A security deposit may be required. Please review the Party Room policies and cleaning requirements before your event.
